name: Resource Whey Protein
description:
Resource Whey Protein is a powder based soluble protein (100% of high-quality whey protein) for the dietary management of malnourished patients or patients at risk of malnutrition with increased protein needs and/or decreased protein intake. 100% high quality whey protein. Neutral taste. Can mix with a wide variety of foods and beverages. Nutritionally incomplete and not suitable for use as a sole source of nutrition. Gluten free. Good solubility.
 *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
